attributes.action: Make it compulsory for everyone to have driving test every 5 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make the driving test Compulsory for anyone after 5 years as they get into the nasty habit of driving with one hand on the steering wheel and other nasty habits.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
